languages.text: {n}Техношаман переводит слова Паскаля в дробь ударов по бубну, когитационные платы драматично звенят. Вдохнув благовонный выхлоп из рычащего кадила и прислушавшись, старик севшим голосом интересуется:{/n} "Преф спрашивает, почему он должен отнестись к твоим словам с почтением, а не отвергнуть во презрении?"

{n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."
languages.original_text: {n}Техношаман переводит слова Паскаля в дробь ударов по бубну, когитационные платы драматично звенят. Вдохнув благовонный выхлоп из рычащего кадила и прислушавшись, старик севшим голосом интересуется:{/n} "Преф спрашивает, почему он должен отнестись к твоим словам с почтением, а не отвергнуть во презрении?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps of his drum. The cogitational circuit boards jingle dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained old voice,{/n} "Pref is asking you to name a reason he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技術祈祷師はパスカルの言葉を翻訳し、ドラムをすばやく叩くと、ドラムにぶら下がっている回路基板がジャラジャラと激しく音を鳴らす。祈祷師は轟音を鳴らす香炉の芳香を吸い込むと、慎重に耳をすませてから緊張した声で告げる。{/n}「プレフは理由を問うている、あなたの言葉を無視せず敬意を持って扱うべき理由を」
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術祈祷師はパスカルの言葉を翻訳し、ドラムをすばやく叩くと、ドラムにぶら下がっている回路基板がジャラジャラと激しく音を鳴らす。祈祷師は轟音を鳴らす香炉の芳香を吸い込むと、慎重に耳をすませてから緊張した声で告げる。{/n}「プレフは理由を問うている、あなたの言葉を無視せず敬意を持って扱うべき理由を」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技术萨满将帕斯卡的话翻译成快速的鼓声，鼓上悬挂的电路板发出戏剧性的叮当声。他吸着香炉散发出的芳香气体，仔细聆听着，然后紧张地说道。{/n}“普雷弗问，他为什么要听你说的话？为什么不干脆无视你们？”
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术萨满将帕斯卡的话翻译成快速的鼓声，鼓上悬挂的电路板发出戏剧性的叮当声。他吸着香炉散发出的芳香气体，仔细聆听着，然后紧张地说道。{/n}“普雷弗问，他为什么要听你说的话？为什么不干脆无视你们？”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Le technochaman traduit les propos de Pasqal à un rythme effréné, ponctué des tintements théâtraux des circuits imprimés. Une fois le message transmis, il inhale une nouvelle bouffée de gaz aromatiques tout en tendant l'oreille.{/n} « Pref demande pourquoi nous devrions traiter vos paroles avec respect, et pas avec mépris, » {n}finit-il par dire d'une voix cassée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technochaman traduit les propos de Pasqal à un rythme effréné, ponctué des tintements théâtraux des circuits imprimés. Une fois le message transmis, il inhale une nouvelle bouffée de gaz aromatiques tout en tendant l'oreille.{/n} « Pref demande pourquoi nous devrions traiter vos paroles avec respect, et pas avec mépris, » {n}finit-il par dire d'une voix cassée.{/n}
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán traduce las palabras de Pasqal con golpes frenéticos en su tambor, haciendo que las placas de circuito que cuelgan de él produzcan un intenso tintineo. Inhala el gas de escape aromático que proviene de su ardiente incensario, escucha con atención y dice con una voz forzada:{/n} «Pref pregunta por qué debería hacer caso a sus palabras y no desestimarlas por completo».
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnochamán traduce las palabras de Pasqal con golpes frenéticos en su tambor, haciendo que las placas de circuito que cuelgan de él produzcan un intenso tintineo. Inhala el gas de escape aromático que proviene de su ardiente incensario, escucha con atención y dice con una voz forzada:{/n} «Pref pregunta por qué debería hacer caso a sus palabras y no desestimarlas por completo».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane übersetzt Pasqals Worte in schnelle Schläge auf seiner Trommel, deren baumelnde Platinen dabei dramatisch klimpern. Er atmet die aromatischen Abgase aus seinem brüllenden Rauchgefäß ein, lauscht aufmerksam und sagt dann mit angespannter Stimme:{/n} "Präf fragt, warum er Euren Worten mit Respekt begegnen sollte und nicht mit Verachtung."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane übersetzt Pasqals Worte in schnelle Schläge auf seiner Trommel, deren baumelnde Platinen dabei dramatisch klimpern. Er atmet die aromatischen Abgase aus seinem brüllenden Rauchgefäß ein, lauscht aufmerksam und sagt dann mit angespannter Stimme:{/n} "Präf fragt, warum er Euren Worten mit Respekt begegnen sollte und nicht mit Verachtung."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Asılı devre kartları dramatik bir edayla tıngırdayan tekno şaman, Pasqal'ın sözcüklerini davulundaki birkaç hızlı vuruşa dönüştürüyor. Gürültüyle çalışan buhurdanından çıkan aromalı egzozu içine çekiyor, dikkatle dinliyor ve kasılmış bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Pref, neden sözlerinizin hor görülmeyip onlara saygıyla yaklaşması gerektiğini soruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into quick taps on his drum, its dangling circuit boards jingling dramatically. He inhales the aromatic exhaust of his roaring censer, listens carefully, and says in a strained voice,{/n} "Pref asks why he should treat your words with respect and not scorn them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno şaman, Pasqal'ın sözcüklerini davulundaki birkaç hızlı vuruşa dönüştürüyor, asılı devre kartları dramatik bir edayla tıngırdıyor. Gürültüyle çalışan buhurdanından çıkan aromalı egzozu içine çekiyor, dikkatle dinliyor ve kasılmış bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Pref sözlerinizi hor görmek yerine onlara neden saygıyla yaklaşması gerektiğini soruyor."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
